name: Wifi Hotspot Widget (Free, No Ads, Oreo Supported)
description: *Sharing your smartphones mobile internet with other devices (PC, Notebook, Smartphone) is called Tethering.*  With this app you can make a WiFi Hotspot with just 1 single Click. Its easy to use, completely free and with ZERO advertising.  Owners of devices with Android Oreo and above who make a donation have the CHANCE to get an notification shortcut which changes color depending on the Hotspot state (enabled/green, disabled/red).  THE DEVELOPER DOES NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE NOTIFICATION WILL WORK ON EVERY DEVICE (ONLY DONATE IF YOU WANT TO SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER, NOT FOR THE POSSIBLE NOTIFICATION).  Please consider donating if you like this app.
